#   Clipmac README

## Clipboard macros

 This utility will copy to clipboard what is configured into the buttons.

## Configuration

Right click on the button ... or ... hold down the shift key, and
click on a button to configure it.

## Screen shot

![screen shot](screen.png)

## Installation

    pip install clipmac

    ... or ...

    https://github.com/pglen/clipmac
